sentence: Mr. BILIRAKIS. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the outstanding  contributions that Mr. Dean Lancaster has made as a volunteer with the  Hernando County School System. Mr. Lancaster offered his services as an  announcer for high school basketball games. Coach Kupcik decided…

Mr. SMUCKER. Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate and recognize  the Manheim Lions Club for their 100th anniversary.
